backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing an e-commerce backend with product management, customer registration, cart operations, order processing with Stripe payment integration, blob storage for images, and role-based access control.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting that OKLCH color system variables from frontend/index.css are properly applied across components, with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files describing routing, landing page sections, OKLCH/HSL color system implementation, component structure, and vegetarian product focus.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with HSL color system variables (converted from OKLCH), Tailwind layers, typography hierarchy, section spacing utilities, and print-specific styles for KOT printing.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO meta tags for Farmgrew Chennai, Inter font preload, and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component with React Query provider, client-side routing logic for all pages (landing, shop, cart, orders, admin, KOT, payment), and authentication/authorization guards.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminCrede: Admin credentials rotation form component with validation, password confirmation, success/error alerts, and mutation hook for updating username and password.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminManag: Admin management interface for granting admin privileges via Internet Identity principals, with principal validation, role checking, and clipboard copy functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminReset: Provides a UI card for resetting admin configuration with confirmation dialog, warning alerts, and instructions for manual canister redeployment via dfx commands.
frontend/src/components/admin/InitialAdm: Form component for setting up initial admin credentials with validation, including username (min 3 chars) and password (min 8 chars) fields, with automatic page reload on success.
frontend/src/components/admin/KOTView.ts: Displays a printable Kitchen Order Ticket (KOT) with order details, customer information, items list, payment method, and formatted timestamps.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLoginF: Admin authentication form with username/password fields, validation, error handling, and integration with the admin authentication hook.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Toggle button component for Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Higher-order component that guards admin routes by checking authentication, admin configuration status, and admin privileges, showing appropriate forms or loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Authentication guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to a login prompt with Internet Identity integration and navigation options.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRegi: A guard component that checks if a user has completed their customer profile registration, showing a prompt to complete registration if not, or rendering children if profile exists.
frontend/src/components/landing/About.ts: Displays the 'Why Choose Farmgrew?' section with three feature cards (Fresh & Quality, Save Time, Hygienic Processing) and an about text emphasizing pure vegetarian products.
frontend/src/components/landing/DietPlan: Renders a grid of three pure vegetarian diet plan cards (balanced, high-protein, low-sugar) with benefits, focus areas, and selection functionality.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Site footer with Farmgrew branding, quick navigation links to sections, contact info for Chennai, and attribution to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/landing/Hero.tsx: Landing page hero section with headline, CTA buttons for shopping and personalized recommendations, and a hero illustration image.
frontend/src/components/landing/Nutritio: Interactive nutrition calculator that lets users build a basket of vegetarian items, calculates nutritional totals, pre-fills based on selected diet plan, and integrates with backend cart functionality.
frontend/src/components/landing/Recommen: Displays an AI-powered recommendations section with interactive goal and dietary preference selection, showing personalized vegetarian product suggestions based on user choices and selected diet plans.
frontend/src/components/landing/ServiceA: Shows service area information with two cards: one displaying Chennai as the currently served city and another announcing expansion to more cities.
frontend/src/components/landing/TopNav.t: Main navigation component with sticky header, logo, desktop/mobile menus, authentication state, cart badge, and navigation links for both landing page sections and shop pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/Container: Simple wrapper component that provides consistent max-width and horizontal padding for page content.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrderTrac: Displays order tracking history as a vertical timeline with status icons, timestamps, and notes for each tracking entry.
frontend/src/components/shop/CategoryFil: Renders a horizontal tabs component for filtering products by category with active state styling.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductCard: Product card component displaying image, name, description, price, and add-to-cart button with authentication check and image fallback handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuthorization: Mutation hook for authenticating admin users with username/password, mapping backend errors to user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminCredentials.t: Mutation hook for updating admin credentials with error handling and query invalidation on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminManagement.ts: Provides React Query hooks for admin role management including listing admins, granting/revoking admin roles, and checking user roles via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminProducts.ts: Exports hooks for admin product operations (CRUD) and admin status checking, including creating, updating, deleting products and uploading product images.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminReset.ts: Provides a mutation hook to reset admin configuration, though it currently throws an error indicating a canister upgrade is required for the actual reset.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Exports React Query hooks for cart operations including fetching the cart, adding/updating/removing items, and clearing the cart for authenticated users.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomer.ts: Provides hooks for customer profile management including fetching customer profile by principal and registering new customers with name, phone, and pickup address.
Exports hooks to check if admin credentials are configured and to set initial admin credentials during first-time setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider with login/logout functionality, identity management, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useKOT.ts: Provides a hook to fetch enriched Kitchen Order Ticket (KOT) data including order details, customer information, and product details for each order item.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Exports hooks for order management including fetching user orders, placing orders with payment method and pickup time, marking orders as paid, and admin order listing.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching products by optional category filter and fetching individual products by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripe.ts: React hooks for Stripe integration including checking configuration status, setting configuration, creating checkout sessions, and polling session status with automatic refetch intervals.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind configuration, HSL-based design tokens for light/dark themes (green/yellow brand colors), typography hierarchy, spacing utilities, and print-optimized styles for KOT receipts.
frontend/src/lib/dietPlans.ts: Defines diet plan types and data for three plans (Balanced Nutrition, High Protein, Low Sugar) with descriptions, benefits, and focus areas.
frontend/src/lib/nutritionData.ts: Nutrition database with per-100g macros for fruits, vegetables, proteins, legumes, and grains, plus a function to calculate totals from basket items by quantity.
frontend/src/lib/productImage.ts: Utility functions to generate product image URLs from normalized product names and provide SVG fallback placeholders when images are missing.
frontend/src/lib/recommendationsData.ts: Defines goal and dietary preference types with a recommendation database that suggests food items based on user goals (balanced, weight-loss, muscle-gain, energy-boost) and filters by dietary preferences.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page with tabs for product management (CRUD operations with image upload), Stripe configuration, order management (mark as paid), admin user management, credential rotation, and system reset functionality.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays shopping cart with item management (quantity update, removal), calculates totals, and handles checkout flow with Stripe or Cash on Delivery payment methods.
frontend/src/pages/KOTPage.tsx: Displays a Kitchen Order Ticket (KOT) for a specific order ID extracted from the URL, with print-friendly layout and back navigation to admin panel.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailsPage.tsx: Shows detailed order information including status timeline, payment method/status, order items with product images, and formatted pricing for a specific order ID.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Lists all user orders with status badges, payment method indicators, and navigation to individual order details; shows empty state when no orders exist.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Handles failed Stripe payment flow by displaying error message, order details, and providing navigation options to retry payment, view orders, or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Processes successful Stripe payment by verifying session status, marking order as paid with amount details, and displaying confirmation with navigation to order details.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Customer registration page with form validation for name, phone number, and pickup address. Displays success state with navigation options after profile save.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Product browsing page with category filtering, loading states, and empty state handling. Displays products in a grid using ProductCard components.
frontend/src/router/navigation.ts: Client-side navigation utilities using browser history API. Provides navigate function and route matching helper.
frontend/src/router/usePathname.ts: React hook that tracks current pathname and updates on browser navigation events (popstate).
frontend/src/sections/LandingPage.tsx: Main landing page component composing Hero, Recommendations, Nutrition Calculator, Diet Plans, Service Area, About sections with shared state for selected diet plan.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter parsing utilities supporting both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence for parameters like admin tokens.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color system using CSS variables (HSL format), custom shadows, animations, and design tokens for the application theme.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking known issue of missing colors on buttons and boxes, with pending fix requests to restore OKLCH-based color system styling.
